ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller

Class TaskController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.projectTOMi.tomi.controller.TaskController

  • @RestController
 @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200")
public class TaskController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest Controller that handles HTTP requests for Task objects in the TOMi system.
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Karol Talbot, Iliya Kiritchkov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Converts Task model objects into HATEOAS Resources.
      private org.slf4j.Logger logger
      Provides access to the logging system for error reporting.
      private TaskService service
      Provides services for maintaining Tasks.

      • TaskController

        @Autowired
public TaskController(TaskResourceAssembler assembler,
                                  TaskService service)
        Creates the TaskController.
        Parameters:
        assembler - Converts Tasks to Resources
        service - Provides services related to tasks

    • Method Detail

      • getActiveTasks

        @GetMapping(value="/tasks")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resources<org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Task>> getActiveTasks(@RequestAttribute
                                                                                                                                     UserAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a collection of all active Task objects to the source of a GET request to /tasks.
        Parameters:
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        Collection of resources representing all active Tasks

      • getTask

        @GetMapping(value="/tasks/{taskId}")
public org.springframework.hateoas.Resource<Task> getTask(@PathVariable
                                                                                                java.lang.Long taskId,
                                                                                                @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                UserAuthManager authMan)
        Returns a resource representing the requested Task to the source of a GET request to /tasks/id.
        Parameters:
        taskId - unique identifier for the Task
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        Resource representing the Task object

      • createTask

        @PostMapping(value="/tasks")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> createTask(@RequestBody
                                                                                           Task newTask,
                                                                                           @RequestAttribute
                                                                                           UserAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                    throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Creates a new Task with the attributes provided in the POST request to /tasks.
        Parameters:
        newTask - a Task object with required information
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        response containing links to the newly created Task
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • updateTask

        @PutMapping(value="/tasks/{taskId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateTask(@PathVariable
                                                                                                   java.lang.Long taskId,
                                                                                                   @RequestBody
                                                                                                   Task newTask,
                                                                                                   @RequestAttribute
                                                                                                   UserAuthManager authMan)
                                                                                            throws java.net.URISyntaxException
        Updates the attributes for a Task with the provided id with the attributes provided in the PUT request to /tasks/id.
        Parameters:
        taskId - the unique identifier for the Task to update
        newTask - the updated Task
        authMan - AuthorizationManager for the requesting user
        Returns:
        response containing a link to the updated Task
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException - when the created URI is unable to be parsed

      • setTaskInactive

        @DeleteMapping(value="/tasks/{taskId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> setTaskInactive(@PathVariable
                                                                                                           java.lang.Long taskId)
        Sets the requested Task's active attribute to false, removing it from the list of active Tasks. Responds to the DELETE requests to /tasks/id.
        Parameters:
        taskId - the unique identifier for the task to be set inactive.
        Returns:
        a response without any content.

      • handleExceptions

        @ExceptionHandler(value=TaskNotFoundException.class)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> handleExceptions(java.lang.Exception e)
        Informs the client that an exception has occurred. In order to keep the server inner workings private a generic 400 bad request is used.
        Parameters:
        e - The exception that had occurred
        Returns:
        A 400 Bad Request Response
